thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 8 of 2268
thread.title: HILARY

author: HILARY
title: HILARY
text: Excellent company. Web page very easy to navigate around. Fantastic idea regarding free sample which arrived very quickly. E mails regarding, measuring, fitting very easy to follow and understand. Order placed, blinds arrived within the stated period of time. Blinds good quality and fit perfectly. Extremely good value for money. I will be ordering again from this company.
